text: Maria Begoña Redal Giraldos (born August 3, 1975 in Navarra) is a goalball player from Spain. She is blind and is a type B2 goalball player. She played goalball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. Her team was third. She played goalball at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in Sydney, Australia. Her team was second. == References == Category:Spanish goalball players Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Navarre
title: María Begoña Redal Giraldos
